== Vadama (CT) (627939) ==

Vadama (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 10.32 sq. km. and harbouring 2898 households with total population of 11573 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 300 km. Male population is 5433 and female population is 6140. Scheduled Caste population is 1255 and Scheduled Tribes population is 16. Census Location Code of the town is 627939<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Chalakudy at a distance of 15 km.
